text: Interstate 540 (I-540) and North Carolina Highway 540 (NC 540) are part of a partially completed beltway around the city of Raleigh in the US state of North Carolina, forming the Raleigh Outer Loop. When complete, the route will form the loop the city, meeting its parent route of I-40 in two locations. And NC-540 is a tollway road while I-540 is a freeway road. ==References== Category:Interstate Highways Category:Roads in North Carolina
title: Interstate 540 (North Carolina)
